mapper.select: /* system.poli_person_mng.code.getInfo */ SELECT A.idx ,coalesce(A.cat_cd_1, '') as cat_cd_1 ,coalesce(A.cat_nm_1, '') as cat_nm_1 ,coalesce(A.cat_cd_2, '') as cat_cd_2 ,coalesce(A.cat_nm_2, '') as cat_nm_2 ,coalesce(A.cat_cd_3, '') as cat_cd_3 ,coalesce(A.cat_nm_3, '') as cat_nm_3 ,coalesce(A.cat_cd_4, '') as cat_cd_4 ,coalesce(A.cat_nm_4, '') as cat_nm_4 ,coalesce(A.cat_cd_5, '') as cat_cd_5 ,coalesce(A.cat_nm_5, '') as cat_nm_5 ,coalesce(A.cat_cd_6, '') as cat_cd_6 ,coalesce(A.cat_nm_6, '') as cat_nm_6 ,coalesce(A.jikgun_cd, '') as jikgun_cd ,coalesce(A.jikgun_nm, '') as jikgun_nm ,coalesce(A.jikgub_cd, '') as jikgub_cd ,coalesce(A.jikgub_nm, '') as jikgub_nm ,coalesce(A.pos_cd, '') as pos_cd ,coalesce(A.pos_nm, '') as pos_nm ,coalesce(A.fdept_cd, '') as fdept_cd ,coalesce(A.fdept_nm, '') as fdept_nm ,A.reg_dt ,A.updt_dt ,to_char(A.reg_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd') reg_dt_char ,to_char(A.updt_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd') updt_dt_char ,A.now_psn ,A.tot_psn ,A.assn_psn ,A.code FROM kcgbd.t_poli_person_report A WHERE 1=1 AND A.code = #{code}
